title: Taking chances
creator_credit: David Taft, Ann Darrouzet, Film Victoria, Australian Bicentennial Authority, Community Services Victoria and Janina Craig Screen Services
brief_description: Discusses recreation and leisure options for intellectually disabled poeple and the benefits to organisers, participants and parents. Profiles intellectually disabled people participating in an aquabuddy program, competitive darts, basketball, radio broadcasting and gardening. Emphasises a focus on ability rather than disability.
